description: Main React component for a lightweight notes application, managing state, API interactions, and UI rendering.

methods.name: loadNotes
methods.description: Fetches notes from backend API, handles errors, and updates state.

methods.name: openCreate
methods.description: Prepares UI for creating a new note.

methods.name: openEdit
methods.description: Prepares UI for editing an existing note.

methods.name: requestDelete
methods.description: Opens confirmation dialog for deleting a note.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Handles saving a note, either creating or updating via API.

methods.name: confirmDelete
methods.description: Deletes a note after confirmation, updates state accordingly.
